file_content.text: You will not steal my victory. Not now.
I have sacrificed too much for this. I will avenge my son--on you and all the Jedi.
Tarnis died because he refused to surrender. Don't make that same mistake.
It's over, Angral.
Surrendering in my moment of triumph... that would be a mistake.
Sacrifice? Is that what you call your genocide on Uphrades?
You're sick.
That was merely a test... and a lure to bring you here.
The only vengeance here will be mine. Prepare to die.
Killing you is a pleasure.
I foresaw this confrontation. I welcome it.
Today, I forge a new era for the Sith. One where the Jedi are finally extinct.
Finish this, Angral. I command it.
With pleasure, my Master.
What... what was that? I felt... the Emperor....
You are his Child. His eyes, his ears... his weapon to command.
Come, Child, fight by my side. It's where you belong.
I'd rather jump out an airlock naked.
Fight the Emperor's control. Remember who you are.
Don't give in to despair.
I feel him in my thoughts. We have to end this fast.
I can handle Angral. Get yourself to safety.
Just run away.
There's no place safe from him. I won't leave you.
If you don't resist the Emperor, I'll destroy you myself.
I can arrange that.
Fine by me. Let's finish this.
If you will not serve, you will die.
For Tarnis....
None of you will stand against me.
